special_text:
The abilities of this planeswalker cost an additional [+1] to activate for each creature in your party. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
[0]: Until end of turn, Heroes you control can be in your party and this planeswalker becomes a 5/5 white Hero creature with indestructible. [i](They replace a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard.)[/i]
[-X]: Reveal the top X cards of your library. Put all creature and planeswalker cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
